paragraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-B
paragraph.content: $37 if the card issuer previously imposed a fee pursuant to paragraph (b)(1)(ii)(A) of this section for a violation of the same type that occurred during the same billing cycle or one of the next six billing cycles; or

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-1-ii
interpParagraph.content: For 2016, $1,017, reflecting a .2 percent decrease in the CPI-U from June 2014 to June 2015, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-3-ii
interpParagraph.content: For 2016, $20,350, reflecting a .2 percent decrease in the CPI-U from June 2014 to June 2015, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii
interpParagraph.content: For 2016, reflecting a .2 percent decrease in the CPI-U that was reported on the preceding June 1, a covered transaction is not a qualified mortgage unless the transactions total points and fees do not exceed;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii-A
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $101,749: 3 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii-B
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $61,050 but less than $101,749: $3,052;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii-C
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $20,350 but less than $61,050: 5 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii-D
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $12,719 but less than $20,350; $1,017;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-ii-E
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount less than $12,719: 8 percent of the total loan amount.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-Interp-2-i-C
interpParagraph.content: Card issuers were permitted to impose a fee for violating the terms of an agreement if the fee did not exceed $27 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(A) and $38 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(B), through December 31, 2015.
